We understand there are questions relating to the closure of an account. We never take the decision to close an account lightly. We understand there are questions relating to the closure of an account. We never take the decision to close an account lightly. We’d like to reiterate that our decision to close the account in November 2019 is unrelated to the current HK situation. Whenever we spot activity differing from the stated purpose of the account or we identify unusual transactions, we will work with our customers to obtain the right information. Over the last few months in working with the customer these requirements were not met and therefore we closed their account.

We understand there are questions relating to the closure of an account. We never take the decision to close an account lightly. We’d like to reiterate that our decision to close the account in November 2019 is unrelated to the current HK situation. Whenever we spot activity differing from the stated purpose of the account or we identify unusual transactions, we will work with our customers to obtain the right information. Over the last few months in working with the customer these requirements were not met and therefore we closed their account.
